actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for increased crude oil production in the United States through the use of price incentives for enhanced crude oil recovery.
short_title: Enhanced Crude Oil Recovery Incentives Act

summary.text: Enhanced Crude Oil Recovery Incentives Act - Amends the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to exempt the first sale price of enhanced recovery crude oil from price controls. Requires that eligible enhanced recovery projects be certified by the appropriate State authority.

titles.title: Enhanced Crude Oil Recovery Incentives Act
A bill to provide for increased crude oil production in the United States through the use of price incentives for enhanced crude oil recovery.
